page.title: 01INTRODUCTION TO REETH GRID
page.content: Our grid incorporates the villages of Reeth and Healaugh and the surrounding area comprising moor,pasture and river.It is in a National Park and Tourism in 1986 is as major a source of employment as hill farming. In our survey we have tried to highlight those aspects of life in the grid which we ,(the children and teacher)thought reflected what it was like to live in the area in 1985/86.We have covered areas including Local services,Leisure, Tourism,Farming ,Care,Ecology and Transport.The area is very rural,with about half the grid Population working within 2 miles of their home.The results of a random sample within the grid showed that everybody had a radio and television, and about a quarter had videos and computer.
